hibernate-mapping.sql-query: SELECT aaa.*, g.GRADE_NAME gradeName FROM (SELECT s.*, es.enroll_status_desc FROM student s LEFT JOIN enroll_status es ON s.enroll_status = es.enroll_status_code WHERE s.enroll_status IN (6, 9) AND s.DELETED = 0) aaa LEFT JOIN grades g ON g.ID = aaa.grade_id AND g.DELETED = 0
